import React, {useState } from 'react' import {useDispatch, useSelector} from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/formContainer' // import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import {saveShippingAddress} from '../actions/cartActions' const ShippingScreen = ({ history }) => { const cart = useSelector(state => state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState(shippingAddress.address) const [city, setCity] = useState(shippingAddress.city) const [state, setState] = useState(shippingAddress.state) const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState(shippingAddress.postalCode) const [country, setCountry] = useState(shippingAddress.country) const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAddress({address,city,postalCode,country})) history.push('/payment') } return ( {/* */}

SHIPPING

setAddress(e.target.value)} />
setCity(e.target.value)} />
setPostalCode(e.target.value)} />
setPostalCode(e.target.value)} />
setCountry(e.target.value)} />
) } export default ShippingScreen
